title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
description: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

items.content_html:
Smarty before 3.0.0 beta 4 does not consider the umask value when setting the permissions of files, which might allow attackers to bypass intended access restrictions via standard filesystem operations.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2009-5054
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20101116174040/http://smarty-php.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/distribution/change_log.txt
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6m9f-8vwq-97pm
items.title: [smarty/smarty] Smarty Does Not Consider Umask Values When Setting Permissions

items.content_html:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Apache Solr Search (solr) extension 1.0.0 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2009-3821
  • http://typo3.org/teams/security/security-bulletins/typo3-sa-2009-014/
  • https://github.com/TYPO3-Solr/ext-solr/commit/5192f489a13ff9417d7b57c63420187789beea5b
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2q2r-xgj5-h3hm
items.title: [apache-solr-for-typo3/solr] Apache Solr Search for TYPO3 vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting

items.content_html:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Install Tool subcomponent in TYPO3 4.0.13 and earlier, 4.1.x before 4.1.13, 4.2.x before 4.2.10, and 4.3.x before 4.3beta2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified parameters.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2009-3636
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/53929
  • http://marc.info/?l=oss-security&m=125632856206736&w=2
  • http://marc.info/?l=oss-security&m=125633199111438&w=2

  • https://web.archive.org/web/20101223093042/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/36801
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c73w-4rcj-2622
items.title: [typo3/cms-install] Typo3 API Install Tool vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting

items.content_html:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the t3lib_div::quoteJSvalue API function in TYPO3 4.0.13 and earlier, 4.1.x before 4.1.13, 4.2.x before 4.2.10, and 4.3.x before 4.3beta2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors related to the sanitizing algorithm.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2009-3633
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/53925
  • http://marc.info/?l=oss-security&m=125632856206736&w=2
  • http://marc.info/?l=oss-security&m=125633199111438&w=2

  • https://github.com/TYPO3/typo3/commit/5d4218fad3aeda46236754004232d7e635205e7a
  • https://github.com/TYPO3/typo3/commit/ef9ab2da76c2506306d835209d2a38195bdf7bcf
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20101223093042/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/36801
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-m7rg-85g8-28m9
items.title: [typo3/cms-core] TYPO3 API function vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting

items.content_html:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the t3lib_div::quoteJSvalue API function in TYPO3 4.0.13 and earlier, 4.1.x before 4.1.13, 4.2.x before 4.2.10, and 4.3.x before 4.3beta2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors related to the sanitizing algorithm.

items.content_html:
The Backend subcomponent in TYPO3 4.0.13 and earlier, 4.1.x before 4.1.13, 4.2.x before 4.2.10, and 4.3.x before 4.3beta2 allows remote authenticated users to place arbitrary web sites in TYPO3 backend framesets via crafted parameters, related to a "frame hijacking" issue.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2009-3630
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/53920
  • http://marc.info/?l=oss-security&m=125632856206736&w=2
  • http://typo3.org/teams/security/security-bulletins/typo3-sa-2009-016/
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20101223093042/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/36801
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-mg66-3x8x-r8g2
items.title: [typo3/cms-backend] TYPO3 Backend vulnerable to Frame Hijacking

items.content_html:
The Backend subcomponent in TYPO3 4.0.13 and earlier, 4.1.x before 4.1.13, 4.2.x before 4.2.10, and 4.3.x before 4.3beta2 allows remote authenticated users to place arbitrary web sites in TYPO3 backend framesets via crafted parameters, related to a "frame hijacking" issue.

items.content_html:
The Backend subcomponent in TYPO3 4.0.13 and earlier, 4.1.x before 4.1.13, 4.2.x before 4.2.10, and 4.3.x before 4.3beta2, when the DAM extension or ftp upload is enabled, allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in a filename.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2009-3631
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/53923
  • http://marc.info/?l=oss-security&m=125632856206736&w=2
  • http://typo3.org/teams/security/security-bulletins/typo3-sa-2009-016/
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20101223093042/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/36801
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-3cqw-pxgr-jhrm
items.title: [typo3/cms-backend] TYPO3 Backend Command Injection via Shell Metacharacters in Uploaded File Name

items.content_html:
The Backend subcomponent in TYPO3 4.0.13 and earlier, 4.1.x before 4.1.13, 4.2.x before 4.2.10, and 4.3.x before 4.3beta2, when the DAM extension or ftp upload is enabled, allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in a filename.

items.content_html:
The Backend subcomponent in TYPO3 4.0.13 and earlier, 4.1.x before 4.1.13, 4.2.x before 4.2.10, and 4.3.x before 4.3beta2 allows remote authenticated users to determine an encryption key via crafted input to a tt_content form element.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2009-3628
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/53917
  • http://marc.info/?l=oss-security&m=125632856206736&w=2
  • http://typo3.org/teams/security/security-bulletins/typo3-sa-2009-016
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20101223093042/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/36801
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2wgg-c8xc-7gg3
items.title: [typo3/cms-backend] TYPO3 Backend Discloses Encryption Key

items.content_html:
The Backend subcomponent in TYPO3 4.0.13 and earlier, 4.1.x before 4.1.13, 4.2.x before 4.2.10, and 4.3.x before 4.3beta2 allows remote authenticated users to determine an encryption key via crafted input to a tt_content form element.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2009-3628
  • https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/53917
  • http://marc.info/?l=oss-security&m=125632856206736&w=2

items.title: [typo3/cms-backend] TYPO3 Backend Discloses Encryption Key
